title: Our first biology experiment
author: Danny Alan
detail:
So, you may remember from the 80's the kids bio toy called Sea Monkeys, remember that from your childhood?

Cobe's Uncle John has claimed the prize for best Xmas present again, (alongside the modelling balloons, that's another post) by giving Cobe something to kick off his first biology experiment with!

Here, you can see Cobe adding the water cleanser to get his Sea Monkeys ready by making sure the water is in the best of conditions! He's rather excited about getting to see them hatch.
